wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|April}}
Events that occurred on 15 April.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1937]]''' - Charles Furth writes [[Letter to Charles Furth (25 April 1937)|a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* '''[[1953]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] gives the [[W.P. Ker Lecture]] at Glasgow University on the religious themes adultery, temptation and repentance in ''[[Sir Gawain and the Green Knight]]''.
* '''[[1954]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 143e]].
* '''[[1962]]''' - Voice actor [[Tom Kane]] is born.
* '''[[1968]]''' - Actor [[Richard Whiteside]] is born.
* '''[[1979]]''' - Actor [[Luke Evans]] is born.
* '''[[1998]] - ''[[Roverandom]]'' is published in the US.'''
* '''[[2003]]''' - ''[[The Art of The Two Towers]]'' is published.
* '''[[2005]]''' - ''[[Reconsidering Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[2007]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Studies: Volume 4]]'' is published.
* '''[[2007]]''' - The first day of [[The Children of Húrin Release Party]] is hosted by [[Tolkien Gateway]].
* '''[[2020]]''' - Voice actor [[Sean Arnold]] dies.

==In Arda==
* {{TA|2510}}:
** [[Battle of the Field of Celebrant]]:
*** The [[Balchoth]] and a great host of [[Orcs]] attack the inferior host of [[Gondor]] on the [[Field of Celebrant]]. 
*** All seems lost for Gondor until the [[Éothéod]] under leadership of [[Eorl]] come to its aid.
*** Death of [[Borondir|Borondir Udalraph]].
*** Together with the [[Éothéod]] [[Gondor]] is victorious and [[Cirion]], steward of [[Gondor]], gives [[Calenardhon]] to [[Eorl]] which becomes the later [[Rohan]].
